actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the United Nations Participation Act of 1945 to halt the importation of Rhodesian chrome.

summary.text: Specifies that the provisions of the Strategic and Critical Materials Stocks Piling Act regarding the acquisition and development of strategic raw materials shall not apply to regulations or prohibitions pertaining to economic relations and/or communications with foreign nations or foreign nationals which are established under the authority of the United Nations Participation Act in response to sanctions imposed by the United Nations. (Amends 22 U.S.C. 287 c(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the United Nations Participation Act of 1945 to halt the importation of Rhodesian chrome.
